Houston.JPMorgan Chase Tower (Houston):
The JPMorgan Chase Tower, formerly Texas Commerce Tower, is a 305.4 m (1,002 ft), 75-story, 2,243,013 sq.ft skyscraper at 600 Travis Street in Downtown Houston, Texas. It is currently the tallest building in the city, the tallest building in Texas, the tallest five-sided building in the world, the 18th tallest building in the United States, and the 107th tallest building in the world.


== Overview ==
The tower was built between 1979 and 1981 as the Texas Commerce Tower.
